chunk:
Lowen's Natural Skin Care In Yo Face! Natural BB Cream

Brand: Lowen's Natural Skin Care

Category: BB Cream

Ingredients: Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Zinc Oxide (nano), Glycerin, Canola Oil, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Polysorbate 80, Lecithin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Butter, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Thiotic Acid, Tocopherol, P
book: 0153-Lowen's Natural Skin Care In Yo Face! Natural BB Cream

chunk:
Acid, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Rosemary Officinalis Leaf Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hyaluronic Acid.

Directions: Apply sparingly in AM/PM after washing (i.e. 1/3 pump). Feel free to apply makeup on top as IYF acts as a great primer! For men, apply to clean shaven skin.

Warnings: For external use only.
book: 0153-Lowen's Natural Skin Care In Yo Face! Natural BB Cream
